mapper.select: SELECT RIGHT(h.payHistoryCode,3) as payHistoryCode ,h.clientBusinessName ,h.`type` ,h.payCost ,h.briefs FROM k1_view_pay_history AS h WHERE h.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT RIGHT(payCancelCode,3) as payCancelCode ,mainBusinessCode ,payHistoryCode ,cancelCost ,issueDate ,approvalDate ,reason ,regId ,regDate ,updateDate FROM k1_tb_pay_cancel WHERE mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT RIGHT(p.payPlanCode,3) AS payPlanCode ,p.mainBusinessCode ,p.clientCode ,p.businessName ,p.totalAccountCode ,p.contractCode ,p.totalPrice AS totalPlanCost ,p.briefs ,p.`type` ,p.managerId ,p.managerName ,p.regId ,p.regName ,p.regDate ,p.updateDate FROM k1_view_pay_plan AS p WHERE p.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT RIGHT(h.payHistoryCode,3) as payHistoryCode ,RIGHT(h.payPlanCode,3) as payPlanCode ,h.clientBusinessName ,h.payCost ,h.totalPlanCost ,h.issueDate ,h.`type` ,h.payType ,h.payMethod ,h.payDate ,h.briefs ,h.managerName ,h.regName ,h.regDate ,h.updateDate ,h.payStatus ,h.endDate FROM k1_view_pay_history AS h WHERE h.payHistoryCode = CONCAT('payHistoryCode_', #{payHistoryCode});

SELECT hd.payHistoryDetailCode ,RIGHT(hd.payHistoryCode,3) as payHistoryCode ,RIGHT(hd.payPlanCode,3) as payPlanCode ,RIGHT(hd.itemCode,3) AS itemCode ,hd.itemName ,hd.unitPrice ,hd.`count` ,hd.totalPrice FROM k1_view_pay_history_detail AS hd WHERE h.payHistoryCode = CONCAT('payHistoryCode_', #{payHistoryCode});

SELECT RIGHT(c.payCancelCode,3) as payCancelCode ,c.mainBusinessCode ,RIGHT(c.payHistoryCode,3) as payHistoryCode ,c.cancelCost ,c.issueDate ,c.approvalDate ,c.reason ,c.regId ,c.regDate ,c.updateDate ,u.userName FROM k1_tb_pay_cancel AS c JOIN k1_tb_user AS u ON c.regId = u.userId WHERE c.payCancelCode = CONCAT('payCancelCode_' #{payCancelCode});

SELECT RIGHT(p.payPlanCode,3) AS payPlanCode ,p.`type` ,p.businessName ,RIGHT(p.contractCode,3) AS contractCode ,p.totalPrice AS totalPlanCost ,p.briefs ,p.managerName ,p.regName ,p.regDate ,p.updateDate FROM k1_view_pay_plan AS p WHERE p.payPlanCode = CONCAT('payPlanCode_', #{payPlanCode});

SELECT pd.payPlanDetailCode ,RIGHT(pd.payPlanCode,3) AS payPlanCode ,pd.purchaseTsCode ,pd.salesTsCode ,RIGHT(pd.itemCode,3) AS itemCode ,pd.madeCompany ,i.itemName ,pd.unitPrice ,pd.tax ,pd.count ,pd.totalPrice FROM k1_view_pay_plan_detail AS pd JOIN k1_view_item_info AS i ON pd.itemCode = i.itemCode WHERE p.payPlanCode = CONCAT('payPlanCode_', #{payPlanCode});
